alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Johnson; Louisa; Muscatine; Scott; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 9:17PM CST until December 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches, and ice accumulations ranging from a light glaze up to a tenth of an inch. Wind gusts up to 35 mph are possible as well. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Iowa and north central and northwest Illinois. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. The precipitation is anticipated to begin as snow during the early morning commute and then transition over to a wintry mix late morning into the afternoon hours. Rain will eventually overspread the area later in the day. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
